about_the_game:
Step into the twilight's grasp, where mystic forces intertwine with the essence of your being, as you bravely navigate the maze's secret chambers, forever marked by the clash of steel and the exhalations of conquered shadows.

  • metroidvania with RPG elements and side scrolling
  • weapons, potions, rings
  • powerful spells
  • secret places full of treasures
  • characters with funny stories
detailed_description:
Step into the twilight's grasp, where mystic forces intertwine with the essence of your being, as you bravely navigate the maze's secret chambers, forever marked by the clash of steel and the exhalations of conquered shadows.

  • metroidvania with RPG elements and side scrolling
  • weapons, potions, rings
  • powerful spells
  • secret places full of treasures
  • characters with funny stories
name: Shadows Labyrinth Demo
short_description: Embark on a journey through the enigmatic realm of shadows, battling countless creatures to unveil the path towards emancipation.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
